review_data.title: Ausgezeichnetes Pop-Up Restaurant
review_data.content: Ausgezeichnetes Pop-Up Restaurant Laavu Haben hervorragend im finnischen Pop-Up-Restaurant Laavu gegessen! Schade, war es nur für 2 Wochen geöffnet!

review_data.title: Down by the riverside
review_data.content: Awesome place if weather is nice - and people are jumping into the river! The currents are strong which makes a great spectacle . Panama has a great spot in the shade but close enough to other side of the river where they sometimes play...More

review_data.title: The mornings are so peaceful here
review_data.content: The Panama Bar opens at 9 am along with the Oberer Letten schwimmbad. There is no entry fee for access to both the schwimmbad and bar. The two level structure offers a sunny spot on the Limmat to relax and chill above the morning sun...More
